DocAttribute.Name: LiningDepth
DocAttribute.Documentation: Depth of the window lining (dimension measured perpendicular to window elevation plane).

DocAttribute.Name: LiningThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the window lining (measured parallel to the window elevation plane).

DocAttribute.Name: TransomThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the transom (horizontal separator of window panels within a window), measured parallel to the window elevation plane. The transom is part of the lining and the transom depth is assumed to be identical to the lining depth.

DocAttribute.Name: MullionThickness
DocAttribute.Documentation: Thickness of the mullion (vertical separator of window panels within a window), measured parallel to the window elevation plane. The mullion is part of the lining and the mullion depth is assumed to be identical to the lining depth.

DocAttribute.Name: FirstTransomOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset of the transom centerline, measured along the z-axis of the window placement co-ordinate system. An offset value = 0.5 indicates that the transom is positioned in the middle of the window.

DocAttribute.Name: SecondTransomOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset of the transom centerline for the second transom, measured along the x-axis of the window placement co-ordinate system. An offset value = 0.666 indicates that the second transom is positioned at two/third of the window.

DocAttribute.Name: FirstMullionOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset of the mullion centerline, measured along the x-axis of the window placement co-ordinate system. An offset value = 0.5 indicates that the mullion is positioned in the middle of the window.

DocAttribute.Name: SecondMullionOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: Offset of the mullion centerline for the second mullion, measured along the x-axis of the window placement co-ordinate system. An offset value = 0.666 indicates that the second mullion is positioned at two/third of the window.

DocAttribute.Name: ShapeAspectStyle
DocAttribute.Documentation: Optional link to a shape aspect definition, which points to the part of the geometric representation of the window style, which is used to represent the lining.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation:
Either both parameter, LiningDepth and LiningThickness are given, or only the LiningThickness, then the LiningDepth is variable. It is not valid to only assert the LiningDepth.
NOTE  A LiningDepth with NIL ($) value indicates a window style with a lining equal to the wall thickness.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR32
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, FirstTransomOffset and SecondTransomOffset are given, or only the FirstTransomOffset, or none of both. It is not valid to only assert the SecondTransomOffset.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR33
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either both parameter, FirstMullionOffset and SecondMullionOffset are given, or only the FirstMullionOffset, or none of both. It is not valid to only assert the SecondMullionOffset.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR34
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The IfcWindowLiningProperties shall only be used in the context of an IfcWindowStyle.
